channel.title: vodka on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay
channel.description: Recent content in vodka on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Bloody Mary
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml vodka 90 ml tomato juice 15 ml lemon juice 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce 2 dashes hot sauce pinch celery salt pinch pepper celery stalk lemon wedge Instructions Build in highball glass over ice. Garnish with celery and lemon.

item.title: Cosmopolitan
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml vodka (citron) 30 ml triple sec 30 ml lime juice 15 ml cranberry juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
